xmlMandatorySingleRootNode.description: This is a fake object node for the DataModelDesigner to draw the object hierarchy properly. It will not be inserted into the data model. The Short Object Name must be FakeParentObject.
Switch interface configuration object to save if virtual ports are enabled and the name of the interface.
Number of virtual ports supported on the switch.
Is Virtual Ports enabled on the switch.

Interface name associated with the switch. If Virtual Ports is not enabled, then this name becomes the interface name. However, if Virtual Ports is enabled, this interface name becomes the base portion of the interface names of the virtual ports. For example, if ifName is eth1, and virtual ports is enabled, then the virtual ports will be eth1.1, eth1.2, eth1.3. This name is generated by the system. It is not writable by applications.
